name: Out of Controls (jauntypixel)
description:
My entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2020, with the theme 'Out of Control'.

You have a finite number of button presses to get through the level, which can be replenished by collecting arrows. Think carefully and try not to run out of controls as you make your way through this puzzling castle.

Gamepad recommended.

Controls
Arrow keys/gamepad directional buttons - Move
Space/gamepad A button - Jump
R/gamepad Y - Use all remaining moves
Alt+Enter - Fullscreen

Music
Title: Ladybug Castle
Creator: Rolemusic http://rolemusic.sawsquarenoise.com/
Source: Free Music Archive https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic
Licence: Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported (CC BY 3.0) https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/deed.en_US
Changes: End of the song removed from original in order to loop seamlessly
